responsibilities: Work with a team of security experts to leverage logs and security events from cloud-deployed applications to detect and respond to intrusion activity and attacks.
Focus on cloud-deployed APIs as part of the global-scale World ID identity service.
Collaborate closely with teams building core technologies to ensure security and privacy are foundational elements.
Participate in an on-call rotation and learn incident handling.
Work cross-functionally with peer teams to negotiate and reach consensus solutions that improve security and privacy.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on security, privacy, and incident handling in cloud-deployed applications, particularly in the context of APIs and identity services. There is no mention of tasks related to training or fine-tuning language models, which is the primary focus of this Activity. The responsibilities do not involve working with language models or customizing them for specific tasks.
